title: Electric Wax Melt Warmer with 20 Pcs Wax Melt Liners Edison Bulbs Candle Warmer Metal Wax Melter for Scented Wax Home Office Fragrance Decor Gifts Spa Aromatherapy, Black
features: What You Will Receive: the package content contains 1 piece of wax warmer and 20 pieces of wax warmer liners, sufficient quantities and nice combination can support your use and decoration needs in daily life

Detailed Size to Apply: the wax warmers for wax melts are measured approx. 12 x 15 cm/ 4.72 x 5.91 inches, and the wax melt liners are about 8.1 x 3.04 cm/ 3.2 x 1.2 inches, proper size makes them suitable for many locations where you want to use

Reliable and Safe Material: the wax warmer for scented wax is mainly made of quality metal material, strong and sturdy, safe and reliable, not easy to rust, fade, tear, wear or break, and you can use for a long time with confidence

Bring Convenience: the wax burner is heated by a light bulb, so you no longer have to worry about open flames or soot when the candle melts, safer than traditional wax extractors and more convenient for you to use

Easy to Use: you just need to add 2 soy wax above the wax melts warmer, and then turn on the switch, the aroma will spread throughout the room; Note that if it is too hot in use, please do not move immediately, and please read the product manual carefully
description: Features:This electric wax warmer is not only a wax melt warmer, but also a nice home decoration, beautiful and bright, which can be placed in the living room, bedroom, table, desk, shelf, window or other places, giving you a relaxing living space after a long day of work.You can put the wax warmer liner on the wax melt warmer for scented wax, and then just throw it away after using, so you don't have to spend time and effort to clean the wax warmer again.Specifications:Material: mainly metalColor: blackSize:Wax warmers for wax melt: approx. 12 x 15 cm/ 4.72 x 5.91 inches Wax melt liners: about 8.1 x 3.04 cm/ 3.2 x 1.2 inchesPackage includes:1 x Candle melt warmer20 x Wax warmer linersNotes:Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size.The color may exist a slight difference due to different screen displays.
